NAME_AT_LEAST_3: Name must be at least 3 characters
NAME_AT_MOST_30: Name must be at most 30 characters
NAME_AT_MOST_100: Name must be at most 100 characters
PASS_AT_LEAST_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
PASS_AT_MOST_20: Password must be at most 20 characters
ROLE_ADMIN_OR_USER: Role must be either admin or user
AGE_AT_LEAST_15: Age must be at least 15 years old
PHONE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_A_STRING: Phone number must be a string
PHONE_NUMBER_MUST_EG: Phone number must be a valid Egyptian phone number
ACTIVE_TRUE_OR_FALSE: Active must be either true or false
VERIFICATION_MUST_BE_A_STRING: Verification code must be a string
GENDER_MALE_FEMALE: Gender must be either male or female
SHIPPING_FEES_MUST_BE_A_NUMBER: Shipping Fee Must be a Number
